function test_counts_to_irr,epochtime=epochtime,debug=debug,verbose=verbose if n_elements(verbose) ne 1 then verbose=1 if n_elements(debug) ne 1 then debug=0 if n_elements(epochtime) ne 1 then epochtime=avg([9.434251237500002E14, 9.434295278700002E14]) counts=[10.,100.,1000] exptime=get_inttime(epochtime,/in_sec) times=[1,10,100] ; seconds waves=[185,185.5,186.1] ; nm binsize=[0.5,0.5,0.6] ; nm ; ; irradiance is in units of Watts/m^2 ; where 1 watt = 1 J/s = km/m/s^3 ; epp=get_energyperphoton(waves,/wave_in_nm) ; Joules area=.01 ;[cm^2] (aperature area) aream=area/double(100.*100) irr=(epp/exptime)/aream if verbose then help,epp,epochtime,exptime,area,irr,times,waves,counts,binsize irrt=counts_to_irr(times,waves,counts,binsize,time_in_ms=0,wave_in_nm=1,/verbose,/do_plot) forprint,irr,irrt success=abs(irr-irrt) le 0.1 message,/info,(success eq 1 ? 'SUCCESS' : 'FAILED') return,success end
